title: Vehicle Monitoring MQTT message
description: For real-time information of a vehicles

eventTimestamp.description: Timestamp of the event that triggered this message. ISO 8601 UTC. Example: 2019-10-15T09:06:10.285218Z

publishedTimestamp.description: Timestamp close to when the message was generated. ISO 8601 UTC. Example: 2019-10-15T09:06:10.285218Z

traceId.description: trace-id of this message. UUID. example: 40634dfc-b8bc-44b5-9353-161ac0b0e80b

vehicleRef.description: Reference to the vehicle. 16-character VIN or 8 character number. Example: XYZ0123X0X0123456 or 123456

journeyPatternRef.description: Reference to the journey pattern the vehicle is currently driving. Example: RUT:JourneyPattern:123

quayRef.description: Reference to the quay that the vehicle is currently at or driving towards. Example: NSR:Quay:123

order.description: The order of the quay that the vehicle is currently at or driving towards, starting at 1

position.description: cordinates of the vehicle, as defined by GeoJson type Point: [longitude, latitude]

distanceMeter.description: The distance driven towards the quay that the vehicle is currently at or driving towards. In meter. Note: approximate if odometer is missing

occupancyPercent.description: The occupancy of the bus delivered in percent

delaySeconds.description: The current delay of the vehicle compared to the plan, in seconds

doorsOpen.description: true if one or more doors are open
